personal.name: Yusuf Umar Hanafi
personal.title: Flutter Developer | iOS Developer
personal.tagline: Crafting exceptional digital experiences with modern technologies
personal.bio: A hard-working, Detail-oriented, problem solver with creative solutions, and self-motivated Mobile Application Developer. Someone who has great ambition to change the world for the better through the lines of code that he wrote. Based on Steve Jobs Think Different principle. With more than 4 years of experience in mobile application development, I hope to make unique and different breakthroughs in solving problems through technology. Through mobile applications, I hope to become a world-class developer that is useful for life.

experience.title: Senior Flutter Developer
experience.description: Leading Flutter development for cutting-edge applications with Clean Architecture principles, BLoC state management, and CI/CD implementation through GitHub Actions.
responsibilities: Developed a cutting-edge Flutter application for Wolkk, integrating BLoC Cubit for state management, adhering to Clean Architecture principles, ensuring clean code practices, and implementing CI/CD pipelines through GitHub Actions for seamless deployment processes
Created and implemented a standardized Flutter project template with optimized initialization code and project structure for improved development efficiency and consistency across Wolkk's projects
Integrated platform channels in Flutter applications at Wolkk to seamlessly connect and synchronize native code, enhancing the overall functionality and performance of the application

Led a development team in creating a cutting-edge POS application for a high-profile German client using Flutter on the Windows desktop platform. Directed communication with product managers, product owners, and clients to ensure project alignment, while providing code reviews, developmental guidance, and maintaining project progress

Implemented a robust method channel framework in Flutter to seamlessly integrate native code written in Kotlin, C++, and Swift, enhancing the performance and functionality of Wolkk's mobile applications
achievements: Successfully contributed to aad_oauth package with adding Azure Active Directory running in Windows Platform
Successfully implemented Android keyboard behavior and custom keyboard layout with multiple language in Windows Platform
Successfully implemented multiple screen Flutter app for customer in Point-of-Sale app
Successfully created engelhorn_package_api package for Flutter to network consumer handler multiplatform apps
Successfully led Engelhorn Stationary Development team from zero

experience.title: Flutter Developer
experience.description: Contributed to innovative Flutter applications with Firebase integration, custom method channels, and performance optimization using MVVM architecture and Cubit state management.
responsibilities: Contributed to the development of the CUiT app by collaborating closely with the Flutter team at Volantis.io, implementing innovative UI/UX features that enhanced user engagement and overall app performance

Implemented Firebase Authentication, Cloud Firestore, Firebase Crashlytics, Firebase App Distribution, and Firebase Dynamic Links into Volantis.io's Flutter app, optimizing user experience and ensuring seamless functionality across all platforms
Implemented a custom Flutter method channel to efficiently integrate a camera AI 3rd party library in Kotlin and Swift, enhancing performance and user experience for CUiT

Implemented optimized performance enhancements in the Buzzco app by integrating advanced Flutter packages and applying best practices in MVVM architecture and Cubit state management, resulting in a seamless user experience and efficient app functionality
achievements: Successfully implemented 3rd party library Banuba Camera SDK to Flutter Android and iOS using Method Channel
Implemented unit test and some debugging tool like Firebase Crashlytics to track app performance and bug

experience.title: Mobile Developer Lead
experience.description: Led mobile development team to achieve top 10 ranking in Play Store education platform with 4.9/5.0 rating from 1800+ reviews using Flutter with MVVM architecture and Provider state management.
responsibilities: Led a team in the development of the Zeniora app utilizing Flutter with MVVM software architecture and Provider as state management, resulting in a seamless user experience and efficient codebase maintenance

Led the mobile development team in optimizing the Zeniora Education app to achieve a top 10 ranking in the Play Store's education platform, resulting in a remarkable 4.9/5.0 rating from over 1800 reviews
Implemented Scrum and Agile methodologies within the developer team at Zeniora Education, resulting in improved collaboration, increased productivity, and timely delivery of mobile applications
Integrated Zeniora App with Midtrans Payment Gateway in webview implementation
Implemented advanced CI/CD pipelines for the Zeniora App, automating the building, testing, and deployment processes, leading to accelerated development cycles and improved code quality
achievements: Achieved a top 10 app ranking in the Play Store's education platform in 2019
Got 1800++ positive reviews with 4.9/5.0 rating in Play Store
Successfully led Zeniora Development team from zero

experience.title: iOS Developer Internship
experience.description: Developed award-winning iOS applications including WWDC 2021 Swift Student Challenge winner, focusing on Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, and Apple ecosystem integration.
responsibilities: Developed an interactive and educational COVID-19 game using Swift Playground, recognized with the prestigious WWDC 2021 award from Apple Inc for innovation and creativity

Created a portfolio of iOS applications at the Apple Developer Academy using Swift, UIKit, and SwiftUI, applying MVVM and VIPER architecture patterns to deliver intuitive user interfaces and robust functionality
Designed and implemented real-time heart rate monitoring functionality for the emergency safety app on iOS and watchOS, utilizing Swift to ensure seamless integration with Apple devices
Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team at the Apple Developer Academy | UC to design and develop a cutting-edge iOS application that showcased innovative features and seamless user experience
achievements: Awardee WWDC21 Swift Student Challenge Award

experience.title: Laboratory Research Assistant
experience.description: Led multidisciplinary teams in developing groundbreaking multimedia applications and provided Flutter mentorship while managing laboratory operations and conducting programming workshops.
responsibilities: Led a multidisciplinary team in the design and development of a groundbreaking multimedia application that revolutionized data visualization in telematics research at B201 Telematics Laboratory

Assisted in conducting research on cutting-edge multimedia technologies at the B201 Telematics Laboratory, leading to the development of innovative applications that pushed the boundaries of the field
Provided personalized Flutter mentorship to students at B201 Telematics Laboratory, guiding them in developing innovative mobile applications and honing their programming skills

Developed and implemented a comprehensive laboratory practicum program for new students in the Electrical Technology Faculty, improving hands-on learning experiences and knowledge retention. Led and supervised assistants in effectively managing laboratory tests and ensuring seamless operations at the B201 Telematics Laboratory

Assisted in conducting interactive C++ programming workshops for students at Sekolah Tinggi Teknologi Angkatan Laut (STTAL), enhancing their foundational skills and understanding of programming concepts
achievements: Led programming laboratory for Electrical faculty students
Initiated mobile programming group for Computer Engineering students

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with React, Node.js, and Stripe integration.
projects.detailedDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with modern technologies, featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and secure payment processing. The application includes an admin dashboard for inventory management and order tracking.
features: Product catalog with search and filtering

challenges.solution: Implemented Stripe's secure payment processing with PCI compliance and webhook validation for order confirmation.
Used React.memo, lazy loading, and image optimization to achieve 95+ Lighthouse scores.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates.
projects.detailedDescription: A modern task management application that enables teams to collaborate effectively with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and comprehensive project tracking. Built with React and Socket.io for seamless real-time communication.

challenges.solution: Implemented Socket.io with conflict resolution algorithms to handle simultaneous edits by multiple users.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A beautiful weather dashboard with location-based forecasts.
projects.detailedDescription: An elegant weather dashboard that provides comprehensive weather information with beautiful visualizations, interactive maps, and detailed forecasts. Features location-based weather data and historical weather patterns.

projects.title: REST API Service
projects.description: A scalable REST API with authentication and rate limiting.
projects.detailedDescription: A robust and scalable REST API service built with Node.js and Express, featuring comprehensive authentication, rate limiting, data validation, and extensive documentation. Designed to handle high-traffic applications with proper error handling and logging.

challenges.solution: Implemented Redis caching and database indexing to handle 10K+ concurrent requests.
Added comprehensive security measures including CORS, helmet.js, and input sanitization.
